name: openshift-highscores-phaser-ui
description: Example of using a UI built on the Phaser framework running in OpenShift

scripts.build: rm -rf dist > /dev/null; esbuild src/index.js --minify --format=esm --bundle --loader:.png=file --loader:.xml=file --outdir=dist --define:DEBUG_INPUT=${DEBUG_INPUT:-false} --define:API_SERVER_WEBSOCKET_URL=${API_SERVER_WEBSOCKET_URL:-null} --define:API_SERVER_URL=${API_SERVER_URL:-null} && cp index.html dist

author: Jason Dudash <jason.dudash@gmail.com>
